title: A Poor Guy's Need For Arcade Ezreal
body:
Alright, i know what you're thinking...what a big nose but what you don't know is, i have feelings but we are not here to talk about that today.
As you all don't know i'm 11 playing league which also means the only way to get RP is from my friends who have credit cards (WHAT....), spoilt brats. Anyways, when you get RP cards it has a fat M there so my parents don't allow me to get one. I'm asking you boosted animals to get a loser like me, Arcade Ezreal {{champion:81}} .


Thanks,
-Protocal (I HAVE MISSPELT ALL OF MY USERS KMS)

replies.body: Go mow some dudes lawns for a few bucks, go to a supermarket and grab a card. Ain't nothing in this world free. People with money didn't get that money by giving shit away
I do, washing dishes gives me 50 cents but like I said, fat M on the gift cards...I can't buy that because of parents :( great name btw
Ain't no supermarket in the country gonna refuse to sell you a card

just get the transaction online, and give the money to your parents after they buy it for you.
then there wont be a big fat M plastered on it
They don't trust 11 year olds with cards.....
Get to plat 5 and ill gift you.
I don't even have a rank yet, 1 win 1 loss placements

wait.
how do you have that summoner icon then?
Lets just say, rich friends means free stuff...they moved country to the na servers which means they can't gift me anymore....
You're gonna have to be extremely lucky to find someone on the internet who is just gonna gift you randomly like that

my friend (boosted) has gotten TWO shyvana skins from people off the internet
lmao
